name: Speak Bubble Gift Tags. Pack of 5
description:
Great as gift tags, table seating, cocktails, etc.

Writeable with metallic pen, chalk, colored pencil, pastel

Stick, punch holes, hang or tie them.

*If you are interested in purchasing in bulk. Message us.

name: Speech Bubble Notes Pad Pack of 3
description:
Pocket size: 3" x 4" inches (approximately)
Made from discarded paper - 100% Eco-friendly

Recycled cover with ten colored and 120+ blank pages.
Acid free.

Responsibly handmade in California.

NOTE:
Message us which "3" notepad colors you would like if its a variety of colors.

name: Speak Bubble Sketchbook
description:
Size: 6 1/4" x 6 3/4 inches

Speaking Bubble cut shaped on the soft cover for your title.
You can draw, stick, cut 2d pop-ups on the cover.

Choose among these simply delightful spot colors--lime green, orange, sunset yellow, purple, pink or white.

Cover Paper Specs:
French Paper Black 100 lb Cover
Paper made using 100% Hydroelectric energy

Inside Pages Paper Specs:
New Leaf Reincarnation White 70 lb Text (Acid Free)
G/M2: 104 	
Caliper: 104 	
PPI: 465 
Opacity: 93	
Brightness: 92

100% recycled content using 50% post consumer waste achieving Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certification, produced elemental chlorine free and manufactured using 100% Green-e certified renewable energy through the purchase of renewable energy credits. The coated two-side (C/2S) matte finish on Reincarnation provides a superior print surface, perfect for high-end projects.



http://www.designspotter.com/product/2010/07/speak-bubble-journal.html

description: These notebooks are a place to record ideas, thoughts, memories, observations, and inspirations RULER JOURNAL in inches and millimeters. or ENVELOPE JOURNAL has baronial and baby envelope guide. Size: 5" x 8" inches / A5 64 blank pages, soy-based ink, acid-free, recycled 70 lb paper, bounded with animal-free glue. As seen at Home by Sunsetand Design*Sponge If you like this. name: One Day At A Time DREAM Planner & Journal
description:
Featuring a clean motivational design printed on both front and back covers.

These notebooks are a place to plan and record your dreams, thoughts, memories, observations, and inspirations. 

"Taking It One Day At A Time" Calendar and Planner has beautiful typography inside the Monthly Perpetual Planner with a weekly to-do check list, and weekly notes page, extras are a vision and dream page, goal setting pages and a couple of blank pages for brainstorming.

• January to December
• Perpetual Calendar Month Spreads
• Weekly Planner
• Weekly Check List
• Weekly Notes
• 10 Goals List
• 4 Blank Pages for goals braintstorming
• Measures 8" x 5"

These books have a thick stock softcover with a semi gloss finish. They are perfect bound with a flat side binding. The paper inside is 70lb thicker than standard pages. It's high quality print production, similar to a paperback novel you might find in a bookstore. An eco-friendly product. Pages made of 70lb post-consumer, recycled paper, lignen and acid free paper. Made in Oakland.

"Taking It One Day At A Time" Journal:
These notebooks are a place to record your dreams, thoughts, memories, observations, and inspirations.
